title: Poove Semboove Lyrics Solla Thudikuthu Manasu
stanzas:
poovae semboovae
un vaasam varum
vaasal en vaasal
un poongaavanam
vaai paesidum pullaanguzhal
needhaanoru poovin madal

nizhal poala naanum
nizhal poala naanum
nadai poda neeyum
thodarginra sondham
nedungaala bandham

kadal vaanam kooda
niram maarak koodum
naan konda paasam
thadam maaridaadhu

naan vaazhum vaazhvae
unakkaagaththaanae
naal dhoarum nenjil
naan aendhum thaenae

ennaalum sangeedham
sandhoashame
vaay paesidum pullaanguzhal
needhaanoru poovin madal

unaipoala naanum
oru pillai dhaanae
palar vandhu konjum
kili pillai naanae

unaipoala naalum
malar soodum penmai
vidhi ennum noolil
vilaiyaadum bommai

naan seydha paavam
ennodu poagum
nee vaazhndhu nandhaan
paarththaalae podhum
